parameters.name: LEntityType
parameters.description: Entity type as defined in swSelectType_e (only swSelFACES and swSelDATUMPLANES are valid values for this method)

title: ISketch.GetReferenceEntity
description: Gets the entity on which this sketch was created.

parameters.name: LEntityType
parameters.description: Entity type as defined in swSelectType_e (only swSelFACES and swSelDATUMPLANES are valid values for this method)

returns: Either a reference plane or a face , depending on the value of lEntityType
remarks:
If the sketch resides on a face that is consumed by subsequent features, then this method returns NULL and swSelNOTHING. To get to the face, edit the sketch using
IModelDoc2::EditSketch
.

examples.title: Get Plane On Which Sketch Created (VBA)
Get Plane or Face for Sketch (VBA)
